name: Die by the Blade
description:
Die by the Blade takes realism in sword fighting to the modern spectrum. Learning from the originators of the genre, the aim is to refine a playing experience into a golden standard of gameplay that keeps evolving as the game develops.

In addition to skill centric 1v1 setting, the game aims to explore different player amounts, styles, and environments. The goal is to create challenging progression system tied in with unlockables and items to show off your status. Multiple characters, swords, and clothing options will be added to the game during development.

Variety in game modes is also a focus with an Adventure Mode that utilizes roguelike elements and narrative in a way that creates a replayable experience where players can hone their skills and find new and rare weapons and skins.

Join the Steam community now and become a part of the bleeding edge of DbtB by getting the Founders Pack to start your journey.
